title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the week in College Football and the NFL. Should the Cowboys go after Jimmy G given Dak's injury? Ross Tucker joins the show to talk about how Niners and Bengals fans should feel after their losses. And Kirk Cousins calls in after a big Week 1 victory to discusses his connection with Justin Jefferson and who picks out his game day outfits!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
